alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield, southeastern Goochland, western Henrico and east central Powhatan Counties and the City of Richmond through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Of Richmond, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Rain up to 1 inch in 1 hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding on roadways in low lying and poor drainage areas. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bensley around 600 PM EDT. Bellwood around 605 PM EDT. Chester and Chesterfield Court House around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pocahontas State Park, Greendale, Richmond Heights, Roslyn Hills, Dumbarton, Midlothian, Drewrys Bluff, Chamberlayne and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
